attributes.action: Allow Jack Tweed to be with Jade Goody and pay back his curfew later !!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow Jack to be with Jade Goody in her time of need, he can pay back his curfew time at a later date.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
